description.value: Table of codes specifying the class of the drug or other substance if its usage is controlled by legislation. In the USA, such legislation includes the federal Controlled Substance Act (CSA) or a State Uniform Controlled Substance Act. Values are drawn from the Pharmacy Law Digest July 1988. Other countries should create their own versions of this table. No suggested values.
